body:
@bradfitz IMO you should use `nacltest.bash` not `make. bash`, although that doesn't completely fix the problem

```
lucky(~/go.devcc/src) % ./nacltest.bash 2>&1 | tail -n 4
Installed commands in /home/dfc/go.devcc/bin
##### Building Go bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist
go build runtime: nacl/amd64p32 must be bootstrapped using make.bash
```
